{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Alien spider light | class = AlienSpiderLight | game = Strife | doomednum = 225 | convid = 294 }}[[Classes]]: AlienSpiderLight
An alien spider-like, pot-like gizmo which emits an ambient sound. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AlienSpiderLight { {{Property|Radius}} 32 {{Property|Height}} 56 +{{Flag|SOLID}} {{Property|ActiveSound}} "ambient/alien1" States { Spawn: SPDL ABC 5 [[A_LoopActiveSound]] Loop } }
